questions: Explain the challenges faced by countries which do not have a democratic form of government.
answers: These countries face the foundational challenge of making the transition to democracy and then instituting democratic government.  They also face the challenge of bringing down the existing non- democratic regime and keeping the military away from controlling the government.  Such countries have to make great efforts to establish a sovereign and functional state.

questions: How is Myanmar facing the foundational challenge of making a transition to democracy ? Explain.
answers: There is absence of democracy in Myanmar as the legitimately elected leader Suu Kyi has been under house arrest for more than 15 years. The country faces the challenge of making a transition to democracy and then instituting a democratic government.
